entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning then changing to snow or rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except 25 mm in a few localities. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then west 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending late this evening then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
